page.title: 20MR.BACKHOUSE-SOLANDER,W'LID
page.content: { Mr.Backhouse}came to Warninglid {40yrs.ago.}Nearly{ everyone}in the village then{worked on farms.}He was the only man who travelled to London to work.{Nowadays}there are very{few {farmworkers}and{most}of the workers {commute to London}or work out of the village. He has seen{many changes.}Oil lamps have been replaced by electricity but there is still no gas in the village. The{buses}used to run hourly from 7.30 to 22.00 & now there are no weekend buses;they go 2hourly & only until 5pm There were{2 shops.}The one in front of Rose Cottage was pulled down & The Old Smithy closed last year. It was a Blacksmith's Forge until 1948. The{roads}used to be full of holes & there was a pig farm where the pond & bridge are now at the entrance to Lydhurst.
